original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1046)@</color>隨著武器飛到指定地點，並且以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(956)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對範圍內敵方造成物理傷害。同時在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4585)@</color> 秒內進入狂暴模式，並強化自身 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HPmax(4590)@</color> 點體力上限以及 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4590)@</color> 點武力智力和 <color=#ccffcc>45%</color> 所有抗性。狂暴模式所切換的招式，威力強大回復時間極短。<color=#4cc769>狂暴模式</color>屬性第一招：以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(601)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>自身範圍內敵方造成物理傷害第二招：以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(606)@ x9</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color> 對敵方全體武將造成物理傷害
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1046)@</color> flew to the designated place with the weapon, and with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str( 956)@</color> <color=#80cc00>Use force</color> to cause physical damage to the enemy within the range. At the same time, enter the violent mode within <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4585)@</color> seconds, and strengthen yourself <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HPmax(4590)@</color> point of physical strength limit and <color=#ccffcc>$Status_Str(4590)@</color> Point military intelligence and <color=#ccffcc>40%</color> all resistances. The moves switched in the violent mode are powerful and the recovery time is extremely short. <color=#4cc769>Furious Mode</color> The first method of the attribute:  Use <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(601)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> to the enemy within your own range The second way to cause physical damage:  Use <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(606)@ x9</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> to cause physical damage to all enemy generals
